EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314 - Q115.Sydney 6/18 - No Show
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at the Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow - Sydney
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Sorry we missed you at the Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow in Sydney on Thursday, June 18th. Our workshop gave attendees the opportunity to collaborate with their peers and get hands-on experience pushing an app on Pivotal CF. All of our sessions were designed to give users a deep dive into PaaS and how it can change the way companies develop, deploy and scale applications for the cloud generation.
We have made our presentation slides available here <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/tagged/pivotal%20cloud%20platform%20roadshow> and invite you to visit run.pivotal.io <https://run.pivotal.io/> to try Pivotal Web Services - simply upload your files and your app just works!
Interested in connecting with us? Please contact us <mailto:info@pivotal.io> to learn more.
Hope to see you next time.
The Pivotal Team
